items.title: Flash Cards
items.summary: Flashcards are one of the most common tools used in teaching. They are pretty easy to use and versatile.
items.content_html:
Flashcards are one of the most common tools used in teaching. They are pretty easy to use and versatile.

Yet,they are often underutilized.

Flashcards are used to improve vocabulary, memory drills and more. With kids REPETITION IS THE KEY.

What are the fun methods with which we can use flashcards?

  1. Set up a sensory bin with Rava(Sooji) / Rice,put the flashcards inside and ask them to take a particular card.
  2. If you've Ice-cream sticks with you, write the letter and ask your child to pickup the matching Flashcard.
  3. Ask your child to use the Flashcard to make sentences.(Improves their vocabulary)
  4. Match the Flashcard with real object.(Ex.Vegetables Carrot-bring the real carrot)

items.title: UyirMei Ezhuthukkal
items.summary: When a vowel( Uyir ezhuthu) and a consonant ( mei ezhuthu) join together they form Uyirmei ezhuththu.A total of…
items.content_html:
When a vowel( Uyir ezhuthu) and a consonant ( mei ezhuthu) join together they form Uyirmei ezhuththu.A total of 216 letters are there in Uyir mei ezhuthukkal. 

Uyir ezhuthu + Mei ezhuthu = Uyirmei ezhuthu

For example: 

அ + க் = க (அ-Uyir ezhuthu , க்- Mei ezhuthu , க - Uyirmei ezhuthu)
ஆ + க் = கா
இ + க் = கி 
ஈ + க் = கீ etc...

Same applies for all the 216 letters. 

Letters with short sound are called "Kuril"
Letters with long sound are called "Nedil"

Uyirmei kuril= 90

Uyirmei Nedil= 126

which makes a total of 216 letters.

items.title: Letter எ
items.summary: Few activities you can do for the letter எ: You can download the worksheet from Free printables Uyir Ezhuthukkal.
items.content_html:
Few activities you can do for the letter எ:


  1. Ask the child to keep the pulses above the letter.
  2. Roll the playdough and keep on the letter.
  3. Draw எலி(mouse) and ask the child to colour.
  4. Cut and do a mouse, paint them later. 
  5. Give the worksheet and ask the child to write the letter and colour the picture.

You can download the worksheet from Free printables Uyir Ezhuthukkal.

items.title: Letter ஊ
items.summary: Few activities you can do for the letter ஊ: Activity we did for the letter ஊ - ஊதல் : Materials…
items.content_html:
Few activities you can do for the letter  ஊ:

  1. Ask the child to keep the pulses above the letter.
  2. Roll the playdough and keep on the letter.
  3. Draw  ஊதல் (Whistle) and ask the child to colour.
  4. Do the activity we did as below.
  5. Give the worksheet and ask the child to write the letter and colour the picture.

 Activity we did for the letter ஊ  -  ஊதல் :

Materials required: 

Color paper/ Newspaper, Glue 

Method: 

Write letter ஊ with the corresponding word or download from our Free printable menu. We wrote ஊ ஊதல். Draw ஊதல் and ask the child to tear the colour paper and stick on it.You can also use old newspaper for sticking or simply colour it.

items.content_html:
Few activities you can do for the letter உ: 

  1. Ask the child to keep the pulses above the letter.
  2. Roll the playdough and keep on the letter.
  3. Draw உரல் and ask the child to colour.
  4. Do the activity we did as below.
  5. Give the worksheet and ask the child to write the letter and colour the picture.

Materials Required: 

Tea powder or Mustard, Glue

Method: 

Write the letter உ with the corresponding word or take a printout under over Free printables menu. Apply glue on thepicture ( we drew உரல் on the paper) and ask your little one to put the mustard seeds/tea powder on உரல். Keep repeating the letter. This will help them recognise the letter உ.

items.summary: I've shared all the activities that I did with my son to learn Tamil Uyir ezhuthukkal. Keep all the…
items.content_html:
I've shared all the activities that I did with my son to learn Tamil Uyir ezhuthukkal. Keep all the things ready with you before day so that you will be able to finish the activity. Take things slowly and start teaching one letter a week. Do not assume that Tamil is a difficult language to learn. Never say that in front of the child. If we practise it is going to be very easy. So encourage them even if they make mistakes. Reminding you once again, Take it slowly one letter a week !  

All the activities to be done under parent guidance only.

items.title: Letter ஈ
items.summary: Few activities you can do for the letter Materials required: Matchsticks, Decorative items , Glue Method: Start saying the…
items.content_html:
Few activities you can do for the letter 

  1. Ask the child to keep the pulses above the letter.
  2. Roll the playdough and keep on the letter.
  3. Draw  ஈட்டி  and ask the child to colour.
  4. Do the activity we did as below.
  5. Give the worksheet and ask the child to write the letter and colour the picture.

Materials required: 

Matchsticks, Decorative items , Glue

Method: 

Start saying the letter ஈ and the corresponding word. Draw ஈட்டி with a pencil and ask the child to stick the matchsticks inside the ஈட்டி. You can decorate by making the sharp end look colorful. We also have our free printable for all the uyir ezhuthukkal.
